tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communication_records (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    appointment_reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_records(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientRecords (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  communication_records TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  status ENUM('scheduled', 'cancelled', 'completed')
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Physician (
    physician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    physician_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    physician_specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    physician_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    physician_phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Appointment (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    physician_id INT NOT NULL,
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appointment_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationRecord (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    physician_id INT NOT NULL,
    communication_date DATE NOT NULL,
    communication_time TIME NOT NULL,
    communication_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    communication_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Billing (
    billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    physician_id INT NOT NULL,
    billing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
